Hello {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
"Palmetto Emp. Name" here with Palmetto Solar. I wanted to personally connect with you and tell you how much we appreciate your interest in working with Palmetto Solar. We understand that you might have a lot of questions about solar energy and how it can help save you money on your energy costs.
Based on your specific questions about solar energy or Palmetto Solar we have provided several links to specific sections of our website to help answer any of your questions.
How Solar Energy Systems Work http://www.palmetto.com/solar-energy-works/
3 Steps to Integrating Solar Energy http://www.palmetto.com/home-solar-process/
Benefits of Solar Energy http://www.palmetto.com/solar-energy-benefits/
How do solar tax credits work? http://www.palmetto.com/solar-tax-credits/
The first step we need to take is setting a time for our energy specialist to meet with you at your home to outline your solar system and determine the amount you could be saving with your custom designed solar system.
You can contact Palmetto Customer Care to set up a free consultation with an energy specialist.
